text: وَمِنَ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ مَن يَغُوصُونَ لَهُۥ وَيَعۡمَلُونَ عَمَلٗا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ وَكُنَّا لَهُمۡ حَٰفِظِينَ
translation: 82. Kaadu Sheetoonak badat kaah kumtaah usuk faxam kaah yayyaaqe mari yan, kaadu wohuk kalah aka taamoomi (xisoosaa kee wohuk kalah tanim kinnuk) aba mari keenik yan, kaadu kay amrik yawqeeniih aben taama baysaanamak nanu ken kaah dacrisna iyye Yalli.
